trends: There have been 26 other sightings in Harrisburg
There were no other sightings in Harrisburg on or around October 20th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsHarrisburg, Pennsylvania. On the morning of October 20, 2008, I took my dog out at 5AM. I immediately noticed a shooting star coming straight down as I walked out of my front door. The sky was clear. The moon was bright. I looked over to my right looking roughly southeast. I noticed a formation of lights. I thought it was a plane at first. It did not move, so I thought it might be a helicopter. However it then changed orientation so that I could clearly see 8 star like lights. There was a center "star" surrounded by 5 others. In between the center and the others darted at least two other red "stars". This lasted approximately ten minutes. During this time I saw at least two more vertical shooting stars. I became a little concerned and went to wake up my wife to show her this formation. In the 2 or 3 short minutes it took my wife to come out the formation disappeared. Later in the day I was typing a report on this incident on the computer at work. A coworker asked me what I was typing. I told her she could look but don't repeat what she reads. When she read my report she gasped. She said she had seen the exact same thing 8 months before at 5 in the morning (including the vertical shooting stars). Has anyone else seen this before?
Summary: Formation with a center "star" surround by 5 others and two red stars darting between the others
